computeCapacity.description: Configuration block for the desired capacity of the fleet. See below.

createdTime.description: Date and time, in UTC and extended RFC 3339 format, when the fleet was created.

disconnectTimeoutInSeconds.description: Amount of time that a streaming session remains active after users disconnect.

displayName.description: Human-readable friendly name for the AppStream fleet.

domainJoinInfo.description: Configuration block for the name of the directory and organizational unit (OU) to use to join the fleet to a Microsoft Active Directory domain. See below.

enableDefaultInternetAccess.description: Enables or disables default internet access for the fleet.

iamRoleArn.description: ARN of the IAM role to apply to the fleet.

idleDisconnectTimeoutInSeconds.description: Amount of time that users can be idle (inactive) before they are disconnected from their streaming session and the `disconnect_timeout_in_seconds` time interval begins.

imageArn.description: ARN of the public, private, or shared image to use.

imageName.description: Name of the image used to create the fleet.

instanceType.description: Instance type to use when launching fleet instances.

maxUserDurationInSeconds.description: Maximum amount of time that a streaming session can remain active, in seconds.

name.description:
Unique name for the fleet.

The following arguments are optional:

state.description: State of the fleet. Can be `STARTING`, `RUNNING`, `STOPPING` or `STOPPED`

streamView.description: AppStream 2.0 view that is displayed to your users when they stream from the fleet. When `APP` is specified, only the windows of applications opened by users display. When `DESKTOP` is specified, the standard desktop that is provided by the operating system displays. If not specified, defaults to `APP`.

tags.description: Map of tags to attach to AppStream instances.

vpcConfig.description: Configuration block for the VPC configuration for the image builder. See below.
